data.enText: not drunk (= not affected by alcohol)

data.chText: 我答应过他，今晚我不会喝醉。
data.enText: I promised him that I'd stay sober tonight.
He was as sober as a judge (= completely sober ) .
serious and sensible
a sober assessment of the situation
He is honest, sober and hard-working.

data.chText: 冷静地想了想以后，我觉得我其实并不需要车。
data.enText: On sober reflection (= after some serious thought) , I don't think I really need a car after all.
plain and not bright
a sober grey suit
stone-cold sober
having drunk no alcohol at all
to make sb behave or think in a more serious and sensible way; to become more serious and sensible

data.chText: 坏消息使我们冷静了一会儿。
data.enText: The bad news sobered us for a while.
He suddenly sobered.
sober up
sober sb up
to become or to make sb no longer drunk

data.chText: 你就待在我们这儿，等酒醒了再走。
data.enText: Stay here with us until you've sobered up.
stone-cold sober
having drunk no alcohol at all
sober up
sober sb up
to become or to make sb no longer drunk

data.chText: 你就待在我们这儿，等酒醒了再走。
data.enText: Stay here with us until you've sobered up.

tr: become sober after excessive alcohol consumption
example: Keep him in bed until he sobers up
After thinking about the potential consequences of his plan, he sobered up

tr: not affected by a chemical substance (especially alcohol)
dignified and somber in manner or character and committed to keeping promises
example: the judge was solemn as he pronounced sentence

value.def: When you are sober, you are not drunk.

example.ex: When Dad was sober he was a good father.
example.tran: 不喝醉的时候，爸爸是一个好父亲。

value.def: A sober person is serious and thoughtful.

example.ex: We are now far more sober and realistic...
example.tran: 我们现在清醒、现实多了。

example.ex: It was a room filled with sad, sober faces...
example.tran: 房间里坐满了人，大家都一脸的忧伤和严肃。

example.ex: The euphoria is giving way to a more sober assessment of the situation.
example.tran: 兴高采烈的情绪不见了，取而代之的是对局面更为清醒的认识。

value.tran: 严肃的;审慎的;头脑清醒的

example.ex: 'There's a new development,' he said soberly.
example.tran: 他表情严肃地说：“又有了新情况。”

value.def: Sober colours and clothes are plain and rather dull.

example.ex: He dresses in sober grey suits.
example.tran: 他总是穿素净的灰西服。

value.tran: (颜色、衣服)素淡的，素净的，古板的

example.ex: She saw Ellis, soberly dressed in a well-cut dark suit.
example.tran: 她看见了埃利斯，他穿着一身裁剪合体的素净的黑西装。
